text: She ’ s bright, she ’ s beautiful, and she ’ s … topless! Ashley Graham is making a colorful splash in the latest issue of V Magazine in a pop art - inspired photo spread shot by Ben Hassett and styled by Anna Trevelyan. The model shows off no shortage of color thanks to bold and fierce makeup by Maybelline ’ s global makeup artist Erin Parsons, and poses with standout accessories including a Fendi logo purse, Louis Vuitton earrings, and a “ Monet ” Jeff Koons x Louis Vuitton collaboration bag. This isn ’ t the first time the model ’ s gone topless for V. The beauty posed nude last May for a black - and - white photo shoot with Mario Sorrenti and corresponding interview with Tracee Ellis Ross. This shoot, entitled “
